code:
sequenceDiagram participant A as Computadora A
(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) participant S as Switch
(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) participant B as Computadora B
(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) participant C as Computadora C
(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode) participant D as Computadora D
(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) Note over S: Tabla MAC vacía Note over A,D: FASE 1: ARP Request (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) A->>S: ARP Request
Origen: A (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
Destino: Broadcast (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode) Note over S: Aprende: Puerto 1 → MAC de A S->>B: ARP Request (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) S->>C: ARP Request (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode) S->>D: ARP Request (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) Note over B,D: Solo C responde al ARP Note over A,D: FASE 2: ARP Response C->>S: ARP Response
Origen: C (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
Destino: A (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController) Note over S: Aprende: Puerto 3 → MAC de C S->>A: ARP Response (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) Note over A,D: FASE 3: Comunicación Directa A->>S: Datos para C
Origen: A (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
Destino: C (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) Note over S: Consulta tabla MAC
Encuentra C en puerto 3 S->>C: Datos (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)

repo_description: Material en abierto para la asignatura Juegos en Red del Grado en Videojuegos de la URJC

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我们从头开始，先确定入口点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance:
明白了，Computadora A
(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)就这样设计。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们需要确保这个逻辑是正确的。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance:
从结构上看，我们有Switch
(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)、Computadora B
(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 这个设计看起来不错。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance:
关于Computadora C
(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)、Computadora D
(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)，你有什么想法？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们需要确保这个逻辑是正确的。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance:
关于Computadora C
(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)、Computadora D
(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)，你有什么想法？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance:
这个系统主要由ARP Request
Origen: A (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
Destino: Broadcast (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)、ARP Request (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)组成。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 好的，那就按这个方案。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance:
从结构上看，我们有ARP Request
Origen: A (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
Destino: Broadcast (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)、ARP Request (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance:
整体架构包含ARP Request (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)、ARP Response
Origen: C (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
Destino: A (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)这几个部分。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们需要确保这个逻辑是正确的。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance:
这个系统主要由Datos para C
Origen: A (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
Destino: C (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)组成。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 这个设计看起来不错。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance:
确认一下，Datos para C
Origen: A (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
Destino: C (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)是正确的吧？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance:
Datos para C
Origen: A (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
Destino: C (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)负责具体的功能实现。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 从结构上看，我们有Datos (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，Datos (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是Datos (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达Datos (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)结束。
